hero.title: toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa
hero.subtitle: Social cafe in the heart of Warsaw

about.title: About us
about.missionText: toMy Kawiarnia is a social cafe run by the Lena Grochowska Foundation. Over 60% of our team consists of people with disabilities, mainly intellectual disabilities. We create a space where employees not only fulfill professional duties but also build self-confidence and acquire new skills.
about.storyText: The Warsaw location, opened in September 2023, is the third point in the toMy social cafe network. Previously, we opened locations in Siedlce and Gdańsk. We are located in the center of Warsaw, on Aleje Jerozolimskie, near the intersection with Marszałkowska Street.
about.award2: Food Business Awards® - Socially Responsible Cafe
about.award3: UN Nansen Refugee Award 2023 - Lena Grochowska Foundation

menu.title: Our menu
menu.coffeeDesc: Aromatic coffee prepared by our experienced baristas. We offer a wide selection of coffee from the best roasters.
menu.pastriesDesc: Delicious homemade pastries and desserts, including our famous cheesecakes. Everything prepared with fresh ingredients.
menu.ceramicsDesc: We participate in ceramic workshops and offer locally made ceramics for purchase.
menu.eventsDesc: We organize live concerts, art workshops, and other cultural events.

footer.rights: © 2024 toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa. All rights reserved.
footer.foundation: A project of the Lena Grochowska Foundation
